task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 23°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, but the top is currently cut off, so I will look up.

Now I can see the entire building from base to roof, and I can estimate its height by counting the floors; it appears to have about 8 floors, and assuming each floor is approximately 3.5 meters, the total height is around 28 meters.
